column1: Continental: change the cap defined for the receipt type 'Waters'
column27:
Dear Team,

 

Customer is asking to update the receipt type *‘Waters '/ ‘Eaux'.*

It has been defined the cap of 7 euros.

And currently, if the entered amount is higher than 7 euros, the following error message is displayed: 'The limit cap is exceeded. Maximum amount is 7 euros.' --> please, see screenshot in the attachment.

In french version: 'La limite pour cette dépense est dépassée, merci de respecter la limite de 7 euros.'

 

They would like to have as below:

1/ Change the cap defined for this receipt type. Replace 7 euros by 9 euros.

2/ Change the error message with the new value so,

+Future versions:+

*in English version:* 'The limit cap is exceeded. Maximum amount is 9 euros.'

*in French version:* ‘La limite pour cette dépense est dépassée, merci de respecter la limite de 9 euros.’

 

Effective date: *01/05/2023*

Location: *CONTINENTAL France*



Thanks in advance!

Karolina
column190:
AMADEUS : ama-de-continental
CONTINENTAL France

In the EMS you open the "advanced system settings" block and add the following setting in the system properties:

Afterwards your system will use the EMS for calculations.

Hello team,

{color:#ff0000}*Please deploy to a test location of prod first. we can deploy to production location after customer testing.*{color}

Could you please adjust the Credit postings record.

Meal restrictions do not apply as the location is foreign(Germany and Franch). But in the Credit posting record an unknown amount of 10 X 3 EUR is posted.
So, Credit posting total amount has 114,50 EUR and does not match Debit record. 

In this case, Credit posting total amount should be 84,50 EUR.

If the location is a foreign country, please adjust so that the amount exceeding the limit is not posted to Credit recorded.

column1: VW SEAT - export modification
column27:
Dear colleagues,

please change first on Prod on 

!image-2023-04-12-18-36-15-536.png|width=382,height=70!

and later for all locations.

customer's request for Export:
 * if a user in the expense settlement has uploaded separately 3 different types of tickets and receipts, this is how we should receive them in SAP. And not everything together as this is how we are receiving it now.
 * when that settlement is sent to our SAP finance, all the receipts and invoices must arrive separately for us to be able to differentiate them and to have a traceability of everything that comes to us.

{color:#ff0000}As this description is not very clear, I had a call with Conovum and received a sample file of customer "Spiegel" who has the setup as expected by SEAT.{color}
{color:#ff0000}I added the sample with the export structure as it should be and a sample as it currently is.{color}

The "Attachments"section is missing in the file from SEAT. Should come after the FDF information. See comparison here (attachments at mirror marked in yellow).

!image-2023-04-12-18-17-50-232.png|width=967,height=304!

 

If you need more information please do not hesitate to contact me.

Thank you in advance and best regards,

Annette

current setup in Bitbucket:

[https://repository.secure.ifao.net:7443/projects/VEG/repos/ce-configs/browse/configurations/amademea/ama-es-Seat/configuration_2023_03_24.xml]

 <!--SFTP -->

      </FDF>

column1: luther:please update GB calculation scripts:ITE-1708
column27:
please update in calculation custom scripts the GB logic as per ITE-1708

Root cause is configuration. The EMS holds only one custom calculation block - valid for all countries:

!_SA_EMS config.png|thumbnail!

That means this block is used for all countries (DE and UK alike)

Inside this block many DE specific validators are used.

That works well for Germany as the not covered parts of the custom calculation fall back to the corresponding DE market template

All employees located in {color:#de350b}UK {color}whereas - fall back to the {color:#de350b}UK {color}market template - that means you are combining {color:#de350b}DE {color}validations with {color:#de350b}UK{color} calculations (which does not work at all)

error:

!image-2023-04-03-08-40-01-794.png!

UK needs to be proper configured - you cannot simply use half UK template and DE custom calculation. 

+*Follow up:*+

Set up UK properly - make the custom calculation block country specific

Grundsätzlich ist das günstigste Verkehrsmittel unter Einschluss des öffentlichen Nahverkehrs zu nutzen. Die Nutzung eines Taxis ist auf Dienstfahrten zu beschränken, bei denen die Nutzung von ÖPNV nicht zumutbar bzw. zeitlich nicht möglich ist."

must be changed to:

column1: Copy custom calculation settings to new custom logic properties
column27:
The calculation settings which were moved in the following stories need to be copied as property to the corresponding subactors in custom logic:
 * EXPENG-1089
 * EXPENG-1101

The following cases have been identified in production:
||Environment||System id||Block id||Property||
|Amadeus|160031994|1505796721194E4CB05C752F0A9E72E5|expense.FR.absence.meal.foreignAbsoluteMealDeductions|
|Mega|2823813307|17F28AE7794D488B96F7594E10AA5109|expense.DE.absence.meal.usePerDiemCountryForAccounting|
|Staging|4126148294|CD0C7E87374C464F9F3A154668E56854|expense.FR.absence.meal.foreignAbsoluteMealDeductions|

 

expense.FR.absence.meal.foreignAbsoluteMealDeductions has been moved to the subactor ActualMealCalculatorFR.
Add the property "foreignDeduction" with value ABSOLUTE to all relevant custom logic blocks via the json editor.
Remeber that there is a statutory fallback if the hook AbsenceListBasedMeal is not overwritten. If that's the case and your block is relevant for FR then you need to copy that hooks contents from statutory and add the property.

 

expense.DE.absence.meal.usePerDiemCountryForAccounting has been moved to the following subactors:
 * TransnetCustomActualMealCalculator
 * EnbwCustomActualMealCalculator
 * EnbwCustomActualMealCalculatorCalendarDay
 * ActualMealCalculatorDE

Add the property "usePerDiemCountryForAccounting" with the value true to all relevant custom logic blocks via the json editor to any of those subactors in case they are used (remember statutory fallback for the ActualMealCalculatorDE).

column1: Deutschlandradio - calculation setting "expense.DE.automaticTMR" true for automatic 3M rule
column27:
Dear colleagues,

with reference to  

https://jira.ifao.net/browse/ITE-1687 and https://jira.ifao.net/browse/CE-4324

please modify the following setting for correct calculation of automatic 3-months-rule:

{color:#de350b}*calculation setting "expense.DE.automaticTMR" needs to be set to true for the automatic three month rule* {color}to take an effect

{color:#de350b}*OR*{color} 

since the customer *{color:#de350b}is still in file-based it's in the calculation.properties file.{color}*

 

Documentation is waiting for update by Andreea Gheorghe, if you double check here for setup:

[https://confluence.secure.ifao.net/display/EXPDLY/Three-month-rule+check+activation] 

If you have technical questions you can contact Marius Hilbich.

Thank you in advance and best regards,

Annette

Server: vegas.travel

column241:
29/Mar/23 12:13 PM;mkuchciak;Hello [~skarja],

All settings are correct. The thing is that we agreed on the cut-off date with the customer to set it to 01.01.2023. The statement is from 2022. Hence the logic doesn't work. However, in Vegas the cut-off date was not set, therefore in the UI (PDF report in this case) the users can see 3M Rule applied even though it is not.

We have 2 possible solutions in here:
 # Make cut-off date in Vegas config, to not see 3M Rule before 2023 in the PDF report
 # Adjust logic in previous period like we have in period starting from 01.01.2023

I'd go with 1st option to sustain our agreement with the customer, nevertheless if the customer wants extend the rule for earlier period we can do it.

Please liaise with the customer and let us now about their decision.

Thank you!

 ;;;

column1: Allianz - Double Budgeting, pdf report remove line "Mahlzeitenversteuerung über die Gehaltsabrechnung"
column27:
Dear Team,

Currently for the configuration "Double Budgeting", when user travels by car and add the kilometers done, they have a "Payment of tax for meal via payroll" because after 20km done the amount change to 0,38€ instead 0,30€ per kilometer.

After verification, it appears that this difference is allowed by the German government and it's not taxable.

I did a test in staging and the line "Mahlzeitenversteuerung über die Gehaltsabrechnung" (Payment of tax for meal via payroll) is not sent in the export (see attached)

So I assume that it's only shown in the pdf report.

Please could you remove it ?

Thanks for your help.

Best regards,

Sandra

column1: Vaillant -  Adjustment custom logic
column27:
Hello team,

Could you please adjustment the custom logic.
A customer implemented custom logic in CI-7229, but it took half a year to deploy, so a few adjustments are needed. Also, since it is not expanded to the DE locations below, please adjust and expand including these locations.

This logic has to be rolled out for all German locations. Currently, there are some locations not affected (e.g. company codes 0110 / Vaillant Deutschland GmbH & Co. KG and 0113 / Vaillant GmbH export).


Currently, there are the following two check boxes, but we will unify the following check boxes into one. And, If the check box is not checked, an error message will be returned. Please update that message as well.

<Now>
□I hereby confirm that this travel expense statement is not related to a company event, entertainment / hospitality of employees or an incentive.
□I hereby confirm that this travel expense statement is related to at least one of above-mentioned expenses which have already been reported in the scope of reporting process to HR department.

!image-2023-03-14-15-16-30-786.png|width=438,height=513!

<After>
□I hereby confirm, that I've taken into account the guideline on the tax wage treatment of entertainments, events and gifts (Vaillant GroupNet => Apps and tools => HR tools => veranstaltungen__bewirtungen_und_geschenke_dokumentieren).

*New text:*
**

{color:#de350b}*GERMAN*{color}

Hiermit bestätige ich, dass ich die Richtlinie zur lohnsteuerlichen Behandlung von Bewirtungen, Veranstaltungen und Geschenken (Vaillant GroupNet => Apps and Tools => HR-Tools => Veranstaltungen, Bewirtungen und Geschenke dokumentieren) berücksichtigt habe. *

*ENGLISH*

I hereby confirm, that I've taken into account the guideline on the tax wage treatment of entertainments, events and gifts (Vaillant GroupNet => Apps and tools => HR tools => veranstaltungen__bewirtungen_und_geschenke_dokumentieren). *




{*}{*}Errro message:

{color:#de350b}*Error GERMAN:*{color}
Bitte bestätigen Sie, dass Sie die Richtlinie zur lohnsteuerlichen Behandlung von Bewirtungen, Veranstaltungen und Geschenken berücksichtigt haben.

{color:#de350b}*Error ENGLISH:*{color}
Please confirm, that you've taken into account the guideline on the wage tax treatment of entertainments, events and gifts.


Best regards,
Yutaka

column1: [Amadeus FACT TR] Update of the Per diem values per countries
column27:
Hello Team,

 

The initial Per diem requested was as follows:
|*Domestic*|*1A Premises*|*High living cost countries (listed in previous slide)*|*Low living cost countries (listed in previous slide)*|
|40 EUR|65 EUR|105 EUR|50 EUR|

 

In short, the change is to move the value of the 50 Euros for the low living and rest of the world to 65 euros, same as the 1A premises (with the subsidized part).

column1: Fix the script error in the oebb-test system on production
column27:
Hello Codebusters,

when I checked our engine logs on kibana prod I noticed the occurrence of multiple rg.graalvm.polyglot.PolyglotException in the oebb-test system.

*org.graalvm.polyglot.PolyglotException: TypeError: Cannot read property 'split' of null*

The cause seems to be that the object minDate is set to null by configuration.getCalculationSetting(...) in the instance of the exception. Generally this code snippet can be found in the last script of the expenseData hook of the validation phase. 
A null-check before any further operation on minDate  should fix the problem.

- System: oebb-test
- Country: AT
- Phase/Hook: validation/ExpenseData
- Subactor: net.ifao.expense.logic.customSubActors.CustomScriptSubActor

column1: Allianz - Change the approval behaviour
column27:
Dear Team,

 

Allianz would like to change a bit the approval behaviour for the locations DE-Allianz Beratungs- und Vertriebs AG.

 

Today all statements need to be approved and after audited before to be exported for reimbursement.

Allianz would like to remove the approver and auditor process for all statements with amount less or equal to 20€.

 

1. Option

User submits the statement without approver and auditor.

The statement will be automatically approved and paid out.

 

2. Option

User submits the statement without approver and auditor.

The statement will be automatically sent to a group mailbox.

Allianz will implement a robotic KI behind this group mailbox.

Approval will be done by KI.

The statement will be paid out.

 

I assume the first option is easily feasible but not sure for the second option requested.

If this last is not feasible, please could you give me the reason (request from Allianz).

 

Please let me know also how many manday is needed it.

 

Thank you.

Best regards,

Sandra

column1: Replace deprecated GBO calculator
column27:
The GBODomesticPerDiemCalculator has been deprecated a long time ago and gbo is already migrated to the EMS. As it seems, it was missed to replace this calculator during migration.

The calculator itself performs a configuration switch based on the condition if a trip covers multiple or just a single day. Replacing this calculator and therefore removing the configuration switch will speed up the calculation by about 250ms.

*How to replace:*
A new perdiem block needs to be added which replaces the old blocks with attributes multipleDays and singleDays. This block will define the base perdiem.
In the custom logic block the calculator can be replaced by the subsequent execution of FindPerDiemDE, PerDiemTripLengthModifier and StorePerDiem.
In the PerDiemTripLengthModifier the fullTrip parameter needs to be enabled.
Based on the defined base perdiem the modifications table can be configured (dayCount=1/2) together with the operation to match the previously used perdiem blocks for single or multiple days.

_ALL~expense.absence.vehicleUsage.moped~Moped~Moped~0.36~0.0~-1~-1_
_ALL~expense.absence.vehicleUsage.bicycle~Fahrrad~Cycle~0.36~0.0~-1~-1_

|*Vehicle type*|*Rates in EUR*|
|Public transport|0.11 / km|

|Rental car w/three or more employees|0.11 /km per person|

About the rates for "Rental car w/two employees" and "Rental car w/three or more employees", these are not passenger rates, and each employee have to claim for mileage. e.g.) if two employee travel together in one car, each employee should select "Rental car w/two employees".

column1: Amadeus: perdiem calculation for trip to Madrid from Amadeus SAS FR
column27:
Dear Team,

 

We noticed that when the first day of trip (departure day) has 2 different countries there is an error in perdiem calculation when the subsidized is ticked

!image-2023-02-22-13-25-14-471.png|width=518,height=74!

1/ good calculation if there is no break between Nice and Madrid trip as below:

!image-2023-02-22-13-19-37-039.png|width=563,height=221!

2/ wrong calculation if there is break between Nice and Madrid trip as below:

!image-2023-02-22-13-21-20-908.png|width=543,height=219!

 For this second example we must to have the same calculation as first now.

Please, could you check this issue?

Thans in advance!

 

BR

Karolina
column190:
AMADEUS-C: ama-es-amadeus
FR - Amadeus S.A.S., Sophia Antipolis
column242:
08/Mar/23 4:38 PM;kgostynska;Hi [~jtkacz] :)

Daily per diem is 40 EUR for France/Spain - in the first example, user didn't have a break between localisations (france/spain) and cytric counted per diem as a half of daily per diem (1/2 of 40 EUR) which is 20 EUR - and this should apply until end of the day.
In the second example, user had a break, and cytric counted it as 2 daily per diems - in 1 day (2/13/23) - 1/2 of half per diem for France and 1,5x daily per diem for Spain - which is wrong. User can't have 2 perdiems in 1 day.

If there is even 1 minute brake the per diem should equal 0?  - Yes, for 2nd country = 0, if the user received per diem in the same day for first country.

I hope is more clear now :)

BR
Karolina;;;
column245: 15/Mar/23 12:00 PM;jtkacz;[~kgostynska]  So both calculations are from Amadeus S.A.S location but one is correct but second is not. Do I understand correctly?;;;
column246: 15/Mar/23 12:11 PM;kgostynska;[~jtkacz] yes, that it is true.;;;

column1: Adapt custom scripts which set perdiem supression FDFs
column27:
Hello Codebusters,

Following the completion of EXPENG-1019 and EXPENG-1055 the validation and pre processing logic of certain validators is moved to two new mandatory phases. These are always executed before the other custom logic phases.
This has the consequence that the FDFs listed below, which where formerly read in the validation phase by the BasicActualAbsenceListValidator to define per diem suppression on absences, are now are read before any custom script can set or alter them.
This can change the suppression of perdiem and result in errors during statement calculations in affected customer systems.

To mitigate this, at use the setter setSuppressSubsistencePerDiem and setSuppressStatutorySubsistencePerDiem of an absence in the relevant scripts directly, when attaching on of the FDFs listed below on statement or absence level.

Relevant FDFs:
FDF_STATEMENT_NO_ABSENCE_REIMBURSEMENT (value: expense.statement.noAbsenceReimbursement)
FDF_STATEMENT_SUPPRESS_SUBSISTENCE_PERDIEM (value: expense.statement.supressSubsistencePerDiem)
FDF_STATEMENT_SUPPRESS_STATUTORY_SUBSISTENCE_PERDIEM (value: expense.statement.supressStatutorySubsistencePerDiem)
FDF_ELEMENT_NO_REIMBURSEMENT (value: expense.element.noReimbursement)
FDF_ABSENCE_SUPPRESS_SUBSISTENCE_PERDIEM (value: expense.absence.supressSubsistencePerDiem)
FDF_ABSENCE_SUPPRESS_STATUTORY_SUBSISTENCE_PERDIEM (value: expense.absence.supressStatutorySubsistencePerDiem)

Using a query ([^Query.sql]) on the EMS databases on Bali, staging and production found multiple configurations of customer systems listed below where the relevant FDFs where used in scripts.

The table list the system ID, custom logic block start and end dates, custom logic block attributes and hooks as points of reference as to where to find the relevant scripts.
If scripts alter FDFs but do this in the AbsenceList hook and after the BasicActualAbsenceListValidator has been executed, they are not critical but should be adapted to be future proof.

BALI:

[^BALI findings.pdf]

PROD:

*>> The old findings have been removed as it is possible that they're outdated. Please request an DB-Query execution from ITS with the [^Query.sql] attached on this issue.*
*>> For a reference, look up [this ticket|https://jira.ifao.net/browse/ITS-35802].*

 

To ease the work on Bali the following list lists the relevant systems names with the corresponding system ID.

column1: Vaillant -  Automatically overwrite tax rate
column27:
Hello team,

Customers report that the tax rate is automatically overridden.
I had opend the ITE-1601. so Could you please adjust the tax rate on configlation of "fullallowance".

<Root cause>
The behavior is caused by missing tax definition in the Engine
The tax rate on this booking is 'Reduced2' rate visible in the UI which corresponds to technical code 'expense.baseReceipt.taxRate.reduced_4
This rate is defined in Vegas configuration for country SK and PT for receipt type 'expense.basereceipt.receipt.hotel'

SK
!image-2023-02-15-10-27-00-034.png!


On Engine side the used configuration is 'fullallowance'. However in those configuration files there is no Accounting Configuration included. Hence, we are taking the information from the default configuration and this one does not have the mentioned tax rate defined.
!image-2023-02-15-10-25-09-862.png|width=1062,height=307!

Tax rate:
!image-2023-02-15-10-26-12-725.png|width=1000,height=526!

Best regards,
Yutaka

column1: NO statutory – Update allowances for 2023
column27:
Please update the Norway statutory file as per followings, all effective from {*}01.01.2023{*}.

<Accommodation allowances>

*Update in statutory.properties

expense.NO.perDiems.perDiem.expense.absence.accommodation.hotel={*}{color:#de350b}634{color}{*}

expense.NO.perDiems.perDiem.expense.absence.accommodation.boardingHouse={*}{color:#de350b}177{color}{*}

expense.NO.perDiems.perDiem.expense.absence.accommodation.appartmentBarracks={*}{color:#de350b}98{color}{*}

expense.NO.perDiems.perDiem.expense.absence.accommodation.noDocumentedAccommodation=205 (no change)

 

<Mileage allowances>

The rates in red are those that have been changed.

The limit (Change of rate when driving below or above 10.000 km) was removed several years ago, and the same rate applies regardless how many KM driven, so please update our config for "motorcar", "dirt", "trailer" and "dirt.trailer".

*For other types of vehicles including "troms", please leave them as they are.
|Type of vehicle|Amount per km|
|Motorcar|NOK *{color:#de350b}3.50{color}*|
|Motorbike (up to 125 ccm)|NOK 2.00|
|Motorbike (over 125 ccm)|NOK 2.95|
|Moped|NOK *{color:#de350b}2.00{color}*|
|Snow Mobile|NOK *{color:#de350b}10.00{color}*|
|Electro Car|NOK {color:#de350b}*3.50*{color}|
|Motorboat|NOK 7.50|
|Other|NOK 2.00|
|Passenger rate|NOK 1.00 / passenger|
|Dirt|NOK {color:#de350b}*4.50*{color}|
|Trailer|NOK {color:#de350b}*4.50*{color}|
|Dirt.trailer|NOK {color:#de350b}*5.50*{color}|

 

<Per diem for international trips>

For rates in each country, please refer to the following website:

[https://arbeidsgiver.dfo.no/lonn-goder-og-reise/reise-og-satser/statens-satser-utenlands]

 

<Meal deduction for International (Foreign) trips>
|Meal|Deduction rate|
|Breakfast|{color:#de350b}{*}20{*}{*}%{*}{color} (changed from 10%)|
|Lunch|{color:#de350b}*30%*{color} (changed from 40%)|
|Dinner|50%|

*No change in deduction rate for domestic (home) trips.

column1: allianz:add check box with validator
column27:
*please add :*

*Checkbox "Generalized per diem" also for location ABV KBV analogue ABV AD*

Please insert a checkbox - analogous to Location ABV AD - for the „{*}Generalized per diem“{*} in the header level between the FDF „Expense reference ID“ and the field „Click/Drop to add attachment“.

!image-2023-02-08-14-57-11-373.png!

 

Effects if the KBV activates the checkbox: No payment of the statutory per diem allowance even if the KBV was on business for more than 8 hours.

 

+Example:+
 # Without {*}Generalized per diem (Status quo){*}:

 

KBV is on business for 7 hours

à no payment of a per diem allowance, if the KBV has received a meal from his employer, the non-monetary remuneration values are displayed to him on the expense report and he must pay tax on these values.

 

KBV is on the road on official business for more than 8 hours

à payment of a per diem allowance of EUR 14 or EUR 28, if the KBV has received a meal from his employer, his per diem allowances are reduced accordingly.

!image-2023-02-08-14-57-44-037.png!
 # With *Generalized per diem*

 

KBV is on business for 7 hours

à no payment of a per diem allowance, if the KBV has received a meal from his employer, the non-monetary remuneration values are displayed to him on the expense report and he must pay tax on these values.

 

KBV is on the road on official business for more than 8 hours

à no payment of a per diem allowance, if the KBV has received a meal from his employer, the non-monetary remuneration values are displayed to him on the expense report and he must pay tax on these values.

!image-2023-02-08-14-58-06-034.png!

 

 

 

 

!image-2023-02-08-14-58-28-249.png!

 

 

!image-2023-02-08-14-58-42-671.png!

System: [https://apac.amadeus.cytric.net/Amadeus-demo-ACOJP]

User name: rshimizu
Statement ID: 2696693

System: [https://apac.amadeus.cytric.net/ACOJP-Product-Enterprise]

User name: ritsuko
Statement ID: 2696700

I learnt from other tickets that this is due to incomplete configuration and can be solved with activating EMS and set engine.pdf.template=false in advanced system settings. 

Can you please fix this issue and also give EMS super administrator role to each user above?

Many thanks in advance for your help.

column27:
Hello team,

Could you please update the system text,

Please remove as below,
{code:java}
     <dataFieldDescriptor type="SystemText" code="expenseStatement.receipts.general.topOfTab">
      <nameTranslation>
        <name locale="en_US">System Text: Expense Statement/Receipts</name>
        <name locale="de_DE">System Text: Expense Statement/Receipts</name>
        <name locale="fr_FR">System Text: Expense Statement/Receipts</name>
      </nameTranslation>
      <assignTo>
        <assign type="${CLASS_Section}" />
      </assignTo>
      <values>
        <item value="expenseStatement.receipts.general.topOfTab">
          <name locale="en_US">To declare private expenses which have been accidentally paid with business credit card, proceed as follows: <br/>
            1.        Create a new receipt with the column ‘to be reimbursed’ and the receipt type “Private expenses company credit card” <br/>
            2.        Insert the private used amount as negative value. <br/>
            3.        In the credit card feed item, set the amount to the value which affects the company (at full private use the amount would be 0.00 CHF)</name>
          <name locale="de_DE">Um versehentliche Privatausgaben mit der Firmenkreditkarte zu deklarieren, gehen Sie wie folgt vor.  <br/>
            1.        Legen Sie einen neuen Beleg mit der Rubrik „zu erstatten“ und der Belegart „Privatausgabe Firmenkreditkarte“ an <br/>
            2.        Geben Sie den privat bezogenen Betrag als negativen Betrag ein. <br/>
            3.        Ändern Sie den Betrag in der Belegzeile aus dem Kreditkartenfeed auf die Höhe des Aufwands welcher die Firma betrifft (bei vollem Privatbezug somit auf 0.00 CHF)</name>
          <name locale="fr_FR">Pour déclarer des frais privés qui ont été payés par erreur avec la carte de crédit business, suivez les informations suivantes: <br/>
            1.        Créez un nouveau justificatif avec la colonne « à rembourser » et le type de justificatif « Carte de crédit de l'entreprise de dépenses privées ».  <br/>
            2.        Insérez le montant utilisé privé comme valeur négative. <br/>
            3.        Dans le poste d'alimentation de la carte de crédit, mettez le montant à la valeur qui affecte l'entreprise (en cas d'utilisation privée complète, le montant serait de 0,00 CHF).</name>
        </item>
      </values>
      <roles>

        <canSee name="ExpenseArranger" />
        <canSee name="ExpenseApproverRestricted" />
        <canSee name="ExpenseApproverFinal" />
        <canSee name="ExpenseAuditor" />

        <canSee name="ExpenseAdministrator" />
        <canSee name="ExpenseAdministratorRestricted" />
      </roles>
    </dataFieldDescriptor> {code}

column1: Unsupported parameter is used
column27:
The parameter *receiptTypeList* of the subactor *PaidByCompanyValidator* has been deprecated some time ago in favor of the parameter {*}receiptTypes{*}.

In engine release 20.4.0 the old parameter has finally been removed and it can be seen in the logs that oebb-test is still using the old parameter and therefore the validator is most likely misbehaving.

Please replace the parameter.

https://es.secure.ifao.net/s/ee/goto/5959bd41fc202f27818b4bbaaa5557a3

column1: [Amadeus GFT Wave 6 Turkey] Per diem calculation is not taking in consideration the other currencies
column27:
Hello Team,

 

It would seem that for all Per diem in Turkey the calculation is wrong.

As a base please look at statement id 13972906

The value itself is okay, but it is shown and calculated in TRY when the Per dieam was in France.

The Per diem for Nice is 65 EUR minus the hotel breakfast we should get 52 EUR. But here we get 52 TRY.

This is not right because 52TRY is around 2.5 EUR

!image-2023-02-02-15-04-51-962.png!

column1: [Amadeus FACT GFT Wave 6 SG] Some differences between the user report and the auditor report
column27:
h2. *User Story*
h4. As a user in role:  Expense Auditor and Expense User

Hello team,

Customer is in Hypercare for some country.

It was reported a difference between the exchange rate in the user report sent to auditing and the report the auditor is looking at. 

In the example below with the expense report *13988718* on the system

There is a small discrepancy in exchange rate here. On the left side is the report that was approved and is pending for auditing. 

The auditor during his auditing, is checking line by line each receipt and clicked on the "mark as audited". When the auditor do this, the report seems to be recalculated which has generated a new exchange rate. So the total amount is after that different.

 

The customer is not expecting this behavior. I am not sure it is normal. Our understanding with the customer is that once the user submit for approval, so the last calculated by him, the data is fixed and when Auditor checks it does not update it?

This was notified for multiple cases like this

 

Acting User Information: user is: Andy Michaels Kah Wah Lim - username: SG3700285

auditor is: Apisada Kharnchanarom - username: TH2101250

!image-2023-02-07-16-45-13-054.png!
column190:
Server: amadeus
System: ama-es-amadeus
Location: SG - Amadeus GDS Singapore
column241:
06/Feb/23 10:04 AM;pthuaud;Hello Team,

 

I just wanted to update on maybe the issue here.

what is happening is that when the auditor is auditing the receipt and the data is the same day as the auditing. It happens that when the auditor is auditing the item and mark it as audited. The exchange rate is updated when audited.

I suspect since it is the same day that between the time the expense is submitted, approver and audited the exchange rate got updated with teh day value as it was not yet.

If you can confirm this behavior as the customer thinks that the exchange rate is fixed upon submitting the expense and approved by the line manager.

 

Best regards,

Philippe;;;
column242:
14/Feb/23 10:10 AM;pthuaud;Hello [~gmalarski] ,

 

This morning Thailand time, on the amadeus system on the amadeus 1 server, the team create a test claim with ID: 14090749

with a receipt for Feb 13 and another receipt for feb 14th.
when it was created, the exchange rate of the receipt for 14th was the same as the one for 13th which is expected as the rate for the 14th in cytric is not yet updated.

 

They lookat it again in the afternoon, the rate has changed.

The team is saying they did not change or do anything this afternoon.

only me who click on the calculate button.

this claim is not submited yet.

To my understanding, the rate would only update or change if we change the receipt, or click on calculate.

even if we submit the rate will not be updated.

and once it is approve it should not be changed as well...;;;
column244:
23/Feb/23 11:53 AM;pthuaud;Hello Team,

Just adding a message to indicate that from the FACT Wave 6 project, this is the last issue before we can close the hypercare.

If we can try to fix this as soon as possible that would be great.

 

From my understanding, we have a bug, because the exchange rate should not be changed once it is approved after submission.;;;

column1: [Amadeus GFT - Turkey] Exchange rate of the Central Bank of Turkey (CBT) not used
column27:
h2. *User Story*
h4. As a

{color:#444444}user / approver / {color}

{color:#444444}When doing an expense claim with a foreign currency, the eschange rate to be use first is the CBT (Central Bank of Turkey) which has been setup as per {color}EXPENG-912

However, this is not the case.

my user pthuaud on the system made the statement #14056104 in the test location and the exchange rate used is not the one from CBT.

Exchange rate used is 20.320800 

The exchange rate on CBT is: 20.3329

 

Please check and fix the issue. Also, as a reminder, we do not apply the 4% on top of the exchange rate for all locations of Turkey.

 

I have compared between the exchange rate displayed on Cytric and the one from these 2 end point:

website of the CBT: [TCMB - Indicative Exchange Rates|https://www.tcmb.gov.tr/wps/wcm/connect/en/tcmb+en/main+menu/statistics/exchange+rates/indicative+exchange+rates]

xml link from which Cytric is getting the rate:

[https://evds2.tcmb.gov.tr/service/evds/datagroup=bie_dkdovytl&startDate=17-01-2023&endDate=19-01-2023&type=xml&key=4AKagiakOA|https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fevds2.tcmb.gov.tr%2Fservice%2Fevds%2Fdatagroup%3Dbie_dkdovytl%26startDate%3D15-06-2022%26endDate%3D15-06-2022%26type%3Dxml%26key%3D4AKagiakOA&data=05%7C01%7C%7C2729b76d8ad04ab35d3708da53fcf783%7Cb3f4f7c272ce4192aba4d6c7719b5766%7C0%7C0%7C637914643200822603%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=GVyIUQOK5cO3OZR0usnWU30DFZ8UIsv4JYeXDnfoTy4%3D&reserved=0]

column1: Investigate and fix the script error in the ama-es-ch system on production
column27:
Hello Codebusters,

when I checked our engine logs on kibana prod I noticed the occurrence of multiple rg.graalvm.polyglot.PolyglotException in the ama-es-ch system.

TypeError: invokeMember (setCostCenter) on net.ifao.expense.customScripts.wrapper.PostingRecordWrapper(...)failed due to: Cannot convert '0'(language: Java, type: java.lang.Integer) to Java type 'java.lang.String': Invalid or lossy primitive coercion.

The execption is thrown during the addVehicleDebitPostingRecord method call in the first js script in the ExpenseData hook of the postingRecordGeneration phase in the custom logic configurations in the location country GB.

Please fix the error.
 * System:           ama-es-ch
 * Country:         GB
 * Phase/Hook:   postingRecordGeneration/ExpenseData
 * Subactor:        net.ifao.expense.logic.customSubActors.CustomScriptSubActor
 * KibanaLogs example:
        https://es.secure.ifao.net/s/ee/app/kibana#/doc/3afe1f90-e0e8-11ec-b748-a7b709a9fb27/ee.1-2023.04/doc?id=U4jI5IUBugrCUMgQcxEO&_g=

+Currently:+ For days marked in yellow (user filled in 00:00-24:00) the user calculates the reduced per diem rate (see red marked amount)

column1: BE Market Template - Per-diem and Overnight allowance rate update for 2023
column27:
KPMG advised that the Belgium regulation for Domestic Per-diem and night allowance has been changed since Sep’17.
Please update the rule and rates as per below, effective from \{*}01.01.2023{*}.

*<Per-diem for domestic trip>*

Previous rule and rates
|Time|Rate|
|> 5 hours and < 8 hours|EUR 3.82|
|More than 8 hours|EUR 19.22|

{color:#de350b}=> Current rule and rates 2023{color}
|{color:#de350b}Time{color}|{color:#de350b}Rate{color}|
|{color:#de350b}> 6 hours{color}|{color:#de350b}EUR 19.99 / day{color}|

*No change in rules and rates for International Per-diem.

 

*<Overnight allowance>*

Previous rule and rates
|If stay overnight|Night allowance|
|If hotel at charge of the employer|EUR 23.04|
|If hotel at charge of the employee|EUR 43.78|

{color:#de350b}=>  Current rule and rates 2023{color}
|{color:#de350b}If stay overnight{color}|{color:#de350b}Night allowance{color}|
|{color:#de350b}If hotel at charge of the employer{color}|{color:#de350b}No longer applicable{color}|
|{color:#de350b}If hotel at charge of the employee{color}|{color:#de350b}EUR 149.99 / night{color}|
column241:
26/Jan/23 2:20 PM;mkuchciak;Hello [~shimizu],

Do I understand correctly that for Per Diems there will be only one threshold? Above 6 hours? And the thresholds above 5 and below 8 are no longer valid?

Also please confirm it this should be greater equal (GE >=) or greater then (GT >)? I'm asking for the confirmation as current setup in statutory is {*}>= 5 hours and <= 8 hours{*}.

Thank you!;;;

column1: Update the systems oebb and oebb-test
column27:
Hello codebusters,

Following the completion of the issue EXPENG-668 the calculator net.ifao.expense.calculation.expense.all.customCalculators.at.BV_OEBB.ActualAbsenceListCalculator
was enhanced with the additional parameter lastDayHourThreshold with the goal to use it as a replacement of the statutory property 'expense.AT.BV_OEBB.absence.lastDayHourThreshold'


To do this the systems oebb and oebb-test need to be updated with the following steps in filebased and EMS.

 

*1.* Add the parameter lastDayHourThreshold to the calculator net.ifao.expense.calculation.expense.all.customCalculators.at.BV_OEBB.ActualAbsenceListCalculator in the customlogic configuration with the value 3 (current value from the system property)


*2.* Remove the statutory property 'expense.AT.BV_OEBB.absence.lastDayHourThreshold' from the systems

column1: Replace DE.EntertainmentDeductableRateCalculator with new AttendeeBasedDeductibleRateCalculator
column27:
In EXPENG-906 we added a new calculator *AttendeeBasedDeductibleRateCalculator* which replaces the existing DE {*}EntertainmentDeductableRateCalculator{*}.

The new calculator is more flexible which allows to determine non-deductible rate for every attendee combination differently. This covers the requirement from PM-2631.

*Adapt the Custom Logic Configuration in the EMS*
 # replace the deprecated {{net.ifao.expense.calculation.expense.DE.basic.entertainments.subCalculator.EntertainmentDeductableRateCalculator}} with the new {{net.ifao.expense.calculation.expense.all.entertainments.subCalculator.AttendeeBasedDeductibleRateCalculator}}
 ## set the values to *attendees* EXTERNAL and MIXED both to a *rate* of 30.
||SERVER||SYSTEMID||CLASSNAME||

column1: der-co-innit:not meal selection validation for itinerary/CI-7541
column27:
HI

 client wants set up as in CI-7541 and currently is not correct for them: we have a check box for ´´no meal´´ instead of being within itinerary

 
h2. target:

1-: ´´no meal´´ selection in a line with the other meals within itinerary:

!image-2023-01-09-12-39-00-563.png!
2-if not meals are selected an error should be returned and should not be able to calculate/submit:

DE: Bitte bestätigen Sie im Reiseverlauf ob Sie Mahlzeiten erhalten haben.

EN: Please confirm in your itinerary by adjusting the check boxes, if you have either received meals or not.

3- ensure a rule is in place that you can not select no meal in combination with a meal on the same day.

{color:#de350b}Is this possible? I have been advised  is custom logic and client was advised by implementer this is possible {color}

Das Travel Management muss stichprobenartig Originalbelege aus allen eingehenden Reisekostenabrechnungen anfordern können, um die Belege auf Echtheit zu überprüfen und um somit die steuerlichen Digitalisierungsvorgaben einzuhalten. column1: ProcuRX-Jifiti - Invalid target currency of exchange rate
column27:
Could you please adjust the "expense.currency"
h2. current issue:

Customer get the error for "{*}Invalid target currency of exchange rate"{*}
I found the past same EMS issue case. ITE-882/CI-7777

The "home currency" is always determined by

1) the currency in the TMS of the location of the user (see screenshot below) 
2) the currency in the EMS/Engine configuration from the statutory properties settings (Could not check cause of missing Access/EMS Superadmin role)

If 1) and 2) mismatch usually the observed error is shown.

user: *nick.kappler@jifiti.com*

A quick comment from my side about the end time there:

!image-2023-01-11-14-59-48-755.png!

This means, the trip ended on the 20th at midnight exactly. So, on the 21st there were zero minutes of travel, which is why no meals are displayed.

Unfortunately, meals are displayed per day, either all or none. We cannot display only some of the meals. If there is at least 1 minute of travel on a given day, all meals are displayed.;;;

column1: EH:increase custom script size limitation/ITE-1475
column27:
dear team as per ITE-1475 please :
code into the custom script a size limitation, for warning messages

ref:

+*ssue as reported:*+

Generic error on a specific statement during calculate action

+*Labels:*+

SAExp:iConf - the statement is inoperable by invalid configuration

+*Root Cause:*+

Multiple warning fields are stored in this statement wit too-large-content. This specifc case resembles ITE-1178. A field non-existing in ce-core is returned by the engine. Thus it is stored as Link. Links have a size limit in the Database smaller than the content:

!_SA_NG Error_Link too long.png|thumbnail!

Above the corresponding NG error.

Here is the Engine calculation response: [^13181003_response.xml]

In short - the calculate is functioning, but ce-core is not able to store the result, cause the result contains too many characters for the link.

The issue is caused by changing the configuration of the warnings FDF retrospectively during the lifetime of this statement.
column190:
system:ama-ch-eh
server:amadeus
locations:all
column241:
27/Dec/22 10:49 AM;nsanchez;client:

hank you for your feedback. This is really strange and unfortunately I don't know exactly what you mean. 
Regarding the warning field, we already had 2 or more tickets in the past and also had the character limit of this field changed from 240 characters to 1500 characters. ( for e.g. 2-16673277933 or 2-16382386753) I have now informed the affected user that this expense statement is unfortunately broken and can not be repaired. He will create the expense statement completely new and deletes the broken one. 
I hope that in the future similar cases due to the same backgrounds do not occur again. This is depending on the enormous effort for the user. ;;;

column1: Hugo Boss - Add new FDF called "Destination"
column27:
Dear Team,

Hugo Boss ask to add a mandatory FDF called "destination" in the statements and this information must be available in the E021.

 

As you can see in the screen shot below, they sent two proposal and I assume that the second one is the most easy to implement:

 

!image-2022-12-22-14-15-22-201.png|width=388,height=390!

 

Thank you.

Best regards,

Sandra
column190:
Server: Amadeus
System: ama-de-hugoboss
column241:
10/Jan/23 10:20 AM;mstaszek;Hello [~ssanz] :)

First proposal is not possible in our product.

Second proposal is possible but we need more information:
 * What kind of field we should implement for "multiple destinations" ?
 * Please clarify what destinations should be available in the field. (should be list in vegas configuration, csv file upload, free text)

Thank you!;;;
column242: 12/Jan/23 11:05 AM;ssanz;Question ask to the customer. I'm coming back to you as soon as I have feedback. BR, Sandra;;;
column244:
23/Jan/23 5:26 PM;mstaszek;Hello [~wenner]  :)

I think what Sandra meant in point *2* was -> Add FDF in TMS and add values (country names) in *CSV file,* this way customer has all control over country available in list both travel / expense.
This will be transferred to expense as a list of countries to select from (dropdown) - thanks to "from.fixed.list" tag in configuration.

And "tick" I think is the wrong word used there - imply check-boxes and customer may think multiple choice FDF is possible - it's not :(  
I would you SELECT from list (only one value can be selected)

so the difference between 1st and 2nd option is *(1st)* list in vegas configuration maintained by us and *(2nd)* list in TMS in csv file maintained by customer.

This part clarify my question -> _Please clarify what destinations should be available in the field. (should be list in vegas configuration, csv file upload, free text)_
I am still missing answer to -> What kind of field we should implement for "multiple destinations" ?

as they proposed:

!image-2023-01-23-17-04-20-254.png!


so the option is free text like Sandra proposed in point 3 but she put it as 3rd choice to fist FDF? - I think there was some misunderstanding there

As I understood from their proposal they want to have 2 FDF:

- First called "Destination" -> here we implement point 1 or 2 from Sandra proposals
- Second called "Multiple Destination" -> here point 3. from Sandra proposal (value should be available in E021) *OR* we can have checkbox so true/ false value and they put countries in expense statement description field.

If you need any more clarification please let me know.

Thank you!;;;

column1: Allianz - Text in the Expense reminder email (related with CI-5816 and CI-6193)
column27:
Dear Team,

This CI is related to CI-5816 and CI-6193.

Allianz asks to add a text at the expense reminder emails (Notification for unsettled trips) but only for all German Locations.

I advise Allianz that the text can only add at the end of the email and it's okay for them.

 The text is the following:

German:

Seit dem 01.01.2020 sind der Travel und Expense Organizer im Sinne einer „End-to-End-Lösung" technisch miteinander verbunden. Somit werden nach der Buchung einer Dienstreise automatisch die vorhandenen Daten aus der Reisebuchung (z.B.: Hotelübernachtungen, Bahnfahrten, Flüge etc.) in das Reisekostenabrechnungstool übertragen.

Diese Buchungen sind dann für Sie im Abrechnungstool jeweils unter dem Reiter Kostenabrechnungen als „Meine Kostenabrechnungen" oder auch als „Kostenabrechnungen für Dritte" in der Arrangerrolle als „nicht zugewiesene Ausgaben" ersichtlich.

„

Dabei müssen Sie zunächst den Beleg anhaken und anschließend auf „Kostenabrechnung erstellen" klicken.  Danach sind die Belege der Kostenabrechnung zugeordnet.

Sollten Sie bereits Ihre Reisekostenabrechnung ohne diese Belege angelegt haben, müssen Sie diese nachträglich einreichen. Hierzu erstellen Sie bitte eine neue Reisekostenabrechnung mit den Belegen unter „nicht zugewiesene Ausgaben". In dieser tragen Sie bitte im Feld „Referenz Expense ID" die Reisenummer der ersten Reise ein. Sie müssen damit auch kein erneuten Reiseverlauf eintragen.

 

English:

Since 01.01.2020 the Travel and Expense Organizer are technically connected with each other for the purpose of an "End-to-End-Solution". This means, that after booking a business trip  all data from the Travel Organizer (e. g. overnight stay at a hotel, train journeys, flights etc.) will be automatically transferred to the Expense Organizer.

Those bookings are then available in the Expense Organizer under the tab called „My Expense Statements" or also under „Expense Statements" in the arranger role as „ unassigned expenses".

"

Thereby you have first to select the respective receipt and click the button „Create expense statement". Subsequently the receipts are assigned to the expense statement.

In case you already have created your expense statement without those receipts, you have to submit those ones retrospectively. Concerning this please create a new expense statement with the receipts listed under „unassigned expenses". Then please enter your trip number from the first journey in the field „reference expense ID". So you don´t have to enter the itinerary once again.

 

Thank you.

Best regards,

Sandra

column1: AUDI - Wrong statements calculation
column27:
Dear Team,

Following the ITE-1289, it seems that the reimbursment amount is not properly calculated.

e.g.: 7799370

 

!image-2022-12-13-15-13-04-812.png|width=404,height=154!

 

+Must be:+

'Sachbezugswerte ...': 10,71 -> this amount is informational only and is not used for calculation

'Summe ...': 87,14 -> is the sum of all receipts - paid by company and paid by Traveler

'Zwischensumme': 87,14 -> is the sum of everything above (mileage, accommodation, receipts) but without the part 'Sachbezugswerte ...'

Abzüglich ...': 7,14 -> is minus the receipts paid by company

'Erstattungsberag...' 80,00 -> the reimbursment amount

 

Please could you verify and fix?

Thank you.

Best regards,

Sandra

column1: Allianz - Change "expense.basereceipt.receipt.hotel" message in systemtext
column27:
Dear Team,

Please could you change in system text the following message for all DE locations including ABV AD:

 

+DE:+

+Current message:+

„Bitte teilen Sie den Hotelrechnungsbetrag auf in Hotelübernachtung und Hotelfrühstück. Geben Sie bei einer Hotelübernachtung die Angabe zum Frühstück im Reiseverlauf unter erhaltene Mahlzeiten an."

 

+NEW:+

„Bitte geben Sie die Hotelrechnungsbeträge getrennt, nach den jeweiligen Mehrwertsteuersätzen („MwSt.") laut Beleg, ein.

Hotelübernachtung = 7 % MwSt.

Hotelfrühstück = 19 % MwSt.

Getränke zum Hotelfrühstück = 7 % MwSt. (Belegart: Bitte Hotelfrühstück verwenden und MwSt. entsprechend anpassen.)"

 

 

+EN:+

+Current message:+

"Please split the hotel invoice amount into hotel accommodation and hotel breakfast. In case the accommodation includes breakfast, please add this information under received meals in the travel section travel itinerary."

 

+NEW:+

"Please enter the hotel billing amounts according to the VAT rates listed in your receipts separately.

Hotel accommodation = 7 % VAT

Hotel breakfast = 19 % VAT

Beverages of hotel breakfast = 7 % VAT (receipt type: Please use hotel breakfast and adjust the VAT rate)"

 

Thank you.

Best regards,

Sandra

03/Jan/23 2:27 PM;mkuchciak;Hello [~ssanz],

I reverted all changes in locations ABV/KBV. System texts for these locations should be the same as previously.

Please note that mentioned by you current messages are present only in system texts on system level, this means only locations without specified message for Hotel Receipt will be updated. I saw that in most of DE locations for this receipt type we have set translations as follow:
*DE:*
_Wenn die Hotelrechnung bereits von der Firma bezahlt wurde, brauchen Sie den Hotelrechnungsbetrag nicht nach Übernachtung und Frühstück zu unterteilen. Geben Sie alles unter Übernachtung an. Bitte laden Sie die entsprechende Check-out Email/Delivery Note hoch. Falls Sie selbst die Übernachtung verauslagt haben, teilen Sie den Hotelrechnungsbetrag auf in Hotelübernachtungen und Hotelfrühstück. Die entsprechende Hotelrechnung muss zwingend in Ihre Reisekostenabrechnung hochgeladen werden. Geben Sie in jedem Fall bei einer Hotelübernachtung die Angabe zum Frühstück im Reiseverlauf unter erhaltenen Mahlzeiten an._
*EN:*
_If the hotel bill has already been paid by the company, you do not need to split the hotel bill amount into hotel accommodation and breakfast. Enter everything as hotel accommodation. Please attach the Check-out Email / Delivery Note to your travel expense report. If you have paid directly the hotel invoice, please split the hotel invoice amount into hotel accommodation and breakfast. The corresponding hotel invoice must be uploaded to your travel expense report. In case the accommodation includes breakfast, please add this information under received meals in the travel section travel itinerary._

Therefore please kindly confirm if ALL DE locations should be updated, including locations with translations above?

In addition, please note that AZ TECH is French locations, and according what I've checked in configs no text should be dispalyed for Hotel receipt in this location.

Thank you in advance for you clarification. You can contact me directly if you need further explanations. :);;;

column1: Allianz - Change the mileage calculation
column27:
Dear Team,

For configuration Double budgeting, today the mileage calculation is as following:

 The first 20km is paid 0,30€ and the next km 0,38€

 

In the case below the first line the amount is (20*0,30)+(95*0,38)=42,10€

And the second one 115+0,38 =43,70€

 

Today Alliaz asks to change this way to calculate and would like that each trip even in the same statement is calculates separately. Is it possible ?

 

If yes, please make the change.

 

Thank you.

Best regards,

Sandra

 

!image-2022-12-06-11-51-16-741.png|width=453,height=257!

 

!image-2022-12-06-11-51-43-192.png!

!image-2022-12-06-11-51-37-111.png!

column1: TripReason in Volkswagen-CSO system exceeds maximum attribute length of EMS
column27:
In the engine log I found an error coming from Volkswagen-CSO system. Apparently the tripReason is send to the engine as part of the calculate and it is a long German translated text which exceeds the maximum attribute length of 250 in the EMS.
 
Possible solutions might be to not send the tripReason since I doubt it changes the calculation as it is a translated description? Or to shorten it so the expense.tripReason = abc is under 250 characters.
 
Correlation ID: 8D817BE5AE4046908AFB458445F40A0C

column1: Update the filebased austrian statutory system and follow up with an update of all EMS instances
column27:
h4.  

*Is blocked by the engine release 20.3.1*

Hello Codebusters,

As a result of the issue EXPENG-953 the filebased austrian statutory system needs to be updated in the kv handel configuration (Country: AT/ StatID: kv_handel).

1) customlogic.properties.xml files:
    1.1) Remove the net.ifao.expense.calculation.expense.AT.KV_HANDEL.absences.subCalculator.absence.KvHandelTripLimitCalculator from the AbsenceList hook.
    1.2) Add the net.ifao.expense.calculation.expense.AT.basic.absences.subCalculator.meal.SetLimitMealCalculator in the AbsenceListBasedMeal hook at the first position (0)
    1.3) Switch the net.ifao.expense.calculation.expense.AT.basic.absences.subCalculator.meal.listBased.ActualMealCalculator in the AbsenceListBasedMeal hook for the net.ifao.expense.calculation.expense.AT.KV_HANDEL.absences.subCalculator.meal.KvHandelMealCalculator

2) country_per_diem_factors.txt and country_per_diem_fix_values.txt files:
    2.1) Add the entry "fairRate" to line 4 (label) in the file country_per_diem_factors.txt. 
    Add an additional identical entry to the other lines.
    
    2.2) Add the value 20.36 to as an additional entry to the country line of austria (AT) in the file country_per_diem_fix_values.txt. 
    For all other country lines add an additional entry with the value of 0.0
 
When the changes have been merged, download the newly build archive for ifaode-ems as soon as it is available ([https://exp-jenkins.home.ifao.net:8443/job/EMSCC/job/Convert%20Bali/ws/output/]) and Import this archive on staging and all production servers.
The option to overwrite existing blocks will have to be enabled during import.

 

*As an additional Point* please enable the following remote tests in the class net.ifao.expense.tools.test.remoteTests.DTValidationTests by removing the annotation @Disabled.
 * dt29654_12DaysMealDeduction
 * dt29654_13DaysMealDeduction

column241:
08/Dec/22 4:09 PM;mkuchciak;+Business Need: customer wants a cap validator for new receipt with custom error message.+


This can be solved with standard validator FixedReceiptReimbursementLimitValidator. Nonetheless, no error message will pop up, likewise the amount will be simply limited to the number indicated in the validator parameter.;;;
column242:
13/Dec/22 4:27 PM;mkuchciak;Hi [~yutaka] san,

We're not allowed to write new custom logic for the customer.

However we can use standard validator {*}FixedReceiptReimbursementLimitValidator{*}. When the validator is used there in {+}no error message{+}. When the user is putting in the receipt an amount higher than 123 CAD then in Reimbursement summary only 123 CAD will be calculated.
E.g. _Personal meal in trip - canada domestic_ = 300 CAD => _Reimbursement_ = 123 CAD without any error messages.

Please confirm with the customer if this solution can be implemented?

Thank you.;;;
column243:
15/Dec/22 8:55 AM;yutaka;[~mkuchciak] 
Hello Maciej san,
Can this limit validator be handled by subactor?

!image-2022-12-15-16-55-05-377.png!;;;
column244:
15/Dec/22 9:30 AM;mkuchciak;Hi [~yutaka] san,

Generally yes, but I have some concerns about recalculating to USD. Nothing in the documentation is mentioned about setting a cap in particular currency. However for each country a separate subactor can be created and this could solve the issue, but then we would need to have a cap in each respective currency.;;;
column245:
16/Dec/22 7:55 AM;yutaka;[~mkuchciak] 
Hello Maciej san,
Thank you for your update.
In this case, we can set only one currency, the Canadian dollar (CAD), because we set the upper limit of personal meals used in the country by employees located in Canada.
Isn't this addition a hassle?
Since the limit for overseas business trips is also handled by the subactor, it is desirable that this additional receipt validator is also processed by the subactor if possible.;;;
